songs.title: That Thing
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Kevin Abstract]
It's been three weeks since you been looking for me
And my story, I done did it for the glory
I'ma do it for the shorties that adore me
I was in my bedroom playing with toy soldiers
The game's been over, I'm a little older
Heart of a soldier, mind of a brainiac
People used to push on the kid like "Dang, can he rap?"
Red and black Jordan socks, all black and his hat
And it's so fitted, man I'm so tempted
To just lit it, or I mean light it
It's so exciting when I get to rhyming
Or straight writing, I ain't even lying
In the booth, don't ever really try and
Okay, kinda, so I guess I was lying
Okay, kinda, so I guess I was lying
Bring it back to the beat
Me, D-R-E, and the, uh, Biggest D in our vocabulary
There's no word close to L-O-S-E, homie
So please check the rhyme cause I shoot 'em out the mind
Like a tech 9, oh, I rep mine to the fullest
That's why I'm the coolest
When I hear the beat I kinda lose it
When I hear the beat I kinda lose it
It's like
Yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah

[Chorus]
And girl, you know you better watch out
When Abstract and Dre in the house
With big, his team, Biggest D, D
With big, his team, Biggest D, D

[Verse 2: Dalvin Tha Real, Kevin Abstract]
I said I'm easily ripping the boys and tipping the boys
I be sipping the boys, be lying
It's Biggest D up in this thing and all these other boys is dying
I already know, I'm always on my grind and now I'm tryna make time
Tryna get mine
I get my energy from my inner G
I be in outer space, chilling with the aliens
I got a space swag like space jam
I got them ladies like "Viggity-vam, godamn, goddamn!"
Like Wiz, homie, this is who I am
If I had to, I could be a woman, bam
I'm not gon' stop until I get up on the top
And if you can't hear the base, then gon' head and turn it up a notch
And if you wanna know the time, I got the Johnny Dame watch
And it's hanging out my wrist, could buy fifteen rocks
Uh, and everything I do, I earned it
It's Biggest D up in this gang, burn 'em like a bad perm
Yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah

[Outro]
Yeah, Dalvin Tha Real and Abstract
You already know, you already know
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, you already know
You already know, you already know
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, you already know, oh, oh
